member.name: T:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.WrapModeAxis
member.summary: Wrap mode for a texture axis.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.WrapModeAxis.Repeat
member.summary: Tiles the texture, creating a repeating pattern.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.WrapModeAxis.Clamp
member.summary: Clamps the texture to the last pixel at the edge.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.WrapModeAxis.Mirror
member.summary: Tiles the texture, creating a repeating pattern by mirroring it at every integer boundary.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.WrapModeAxis.OnceMirror
member.summary: Mirrors the texture once, then clamps to edge pixels.

member.summary: Wrap mode for all axes of a texture.
member.param: Texture U coordinate wrapping mode.

member.summary: Texture U coordinate wrapping mode.

member.summary: Texture V coordinate wrapping mode.

member.summary: Texture W coordinate wrapping mode for Texture3D.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.WrapModeTexture.Repeat
member.summary: Tiles the texture, creating a repeating pattern.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.WrapModeTexture.Clamp
member.summary: Clamps the texture to the last pixel at the edge.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.WrapModeTexture.Mirror
member.summary: Tiles the texture, creating a repeating pattern by mirroring it at every integer boundary.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.WrapModeTexture.OnceMirror
member.summary: Mirrors the texture once, then clamps to edge pixels.

member.name: T:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureResamplingFilter
member.summary: Algorithm used to resample a texture, like when it is resized.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureResamplingFilter.Point
member.summary: Only uses original colors, without blending. Very fast, but can cause all sorts of artifacts.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureResamplingFilter.Box
member.summary: Merges points within the target box area equally, for fully blocky pixelated jaggies.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureResamplingFilter.Bilinear
member.summary: Linearly interpolates the surrounding pixels by average weighted on proximity.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureResamplingFilter.Hermite
member.summary: Smoothed triangular filter for edge-rounding but blocky results.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureResamplingFilter.BSpline
member.summary: Very smooth interpolation that emulates a Gaussian blurring filter.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureResamplingFilter.CatmullRom
member.summary: Cardinal spline filter considered satisfactory by image experts to avoid blurring.
member.remarks: Can overshoot, so it may cause artifacts in HDR near extremely bright areas.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureResamplingFilter.MitchellNetravali
member.summary: BC-spline filter deemed satisfactory by image experts to generally avoid artifacts.
member.remarks: Can overshoot, so it may cause artifacts in HDR near extremely bright areas.

member.summary: Name pattern for the texture.

member.summary: Texture content is color stored in gamma space.

member.summary: Flag indicating that the alpha channel is opacity.

member.summary: Enable mipmap generation.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureImportation.mipmapLimit

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureImportation.filterMode

member.summary: Increases texture quality when viewing it at a steep angle.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureImportation.maxSize

member.summary: Texture processing utility for Unity, using parallel CPU threads.

member.summary: Texture processing utility for Unity, using GPU compute shaders.

member.name: T:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.MemoryCache`1
member.summary: A simple in-memory cache of byte data.
member.typeparam: The type of the cache key be set to the data.
member.param: Maximum allowed size of cached data in bytes.

member.name: M:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.MemoryCache`1.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: A simple in-memory cache of byte data.
member.typeparam: The type of the cache key be set to the data.
member.param: Maximum allowed size of cached data in bytes.

member.name: T:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureCompressionFormat
member.summary: Options for the compressed texture formats that are available on the target build platform.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureCompressionFormat.Unknown
member.summary: Use an undefined texture compression format.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureCompressionFormat.ETC
member.summary: Use ETC1 texture compression (or ETC2 for textures with alpha).
member.remarks: The ETC1 texture compression format is available on all Android devices.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureCompressionFormat.ETC2
member.summary: Use ETC2 texture compression.
member.remarks: The ETC2 texture compression format is only available on devices that support OpenGL ES 3.0.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureCompressionFormat.ASTC
member.summary: Use ASTC texture compression.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureCompressionFormat.PVRTC
member.summary: Use PowerVR texture compression.
member.remarks: This texture compression format is only available on devices that have a PowerVR GPU.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureCompressionFormat.DXTC
member.summary: Use S3 texture compression (DXT1, DXT5).
member.remarks: This format is only available on devices that have NVidia Tegra, Vivante and Intel GPUs.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureCompressionFormat.BPTC
member.summary: Use BPTC (BC6H, BC7) texture compression + DXT + RGTC.

member.name: F:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.TextureCompressionFormat.DXTC_RGTC
member.summary: Use DXT + RGTC (BC4, BC5) texture compression.
member.remarks: This texture compression format is only available on devices that have AMD GPU (Magic Leap 2). Public since 2023.1.

member.name: M:Alfish.Unity.KRaster.Editor.UnityCompat.GetDefaultTextureCompressionFormat(UnityEditor.BuildTarget,UnityEditor.BuildTargetGroup)
member.summary: Call internal PlayerSettings.GetDefaultTextureCompressionFormat.
member.param: The platform to check (Unity 6 or higher).
The platform group to check (before Unity 6).
member.returns: A TextureCompressionFormat enum value; or null if the method is unavailable.
